tax_cascading_help.message: When this option is enabled, the tax calculation is done on the Excl. VAT value plus previously calculated taxes.

tax_rounding_help.message: Determines when the tax amount shall be rounded (on the shopping carts, orders, invoices...)

price_discount_section_help.message: To apply a <label class="in-text" for="discount"> promotion</label> on the amount indicated above, enter the promotion value as well as the promotion type: percentage, promotional price or value to be deducted.

price_publication_section_help.message:
You can specify a validity period for this price.
Important if you define a promotional price, it is recommended to specify an .

price_create_discount_from_price.message: create a promotional price from this price

category_exists.message: there is already a category with this code

zone_exists.message: there is already an area with this code

tax_update_in_progress_help.message: Taxes update is in progress. Setup will be available again after update.
